name: backend
description: Firebase backend system with Cloud Functions for storing and retrieving JSON documents

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webapp
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && firebase emulators:start
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && (nodemon --watch ../webapp --ext html,css,js --exec 'npm run build:webapp' & NODE_ENV=development firebase emulators:start --import=./emulator-data --export-on-exit)
scripts.dev:with-data: npm run build && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && node scripts/start-with-data.js
scripts.deploy:functions: firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build && firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:rules: firebase use splitifyd && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
